targets.expr:
sum(increase(cs_filesource_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__range]) or vector(0)) + 
sum(increase(cs_cloudwatch_stream_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__range]) or vector(0)) + 
sum(increase(cs_journalctlsource_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__range]) or vector(0)) + 
sum(increase(cs_syslogsource_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__range]) or vector(0)) +
sum(increase(cs_dockersource_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__range]) or vector(0))

sum(rate(cs_filesource_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__interval]) or vector(0)) + 
sum(rate(cs_cloudwatch_stream_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__interval]) or vector(0)) + 
sum(rate(cs_journalctlsource_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__interval]) or vector(0)) + 
sum(rate(cs_syslogsource_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__interval]) or vector(0)) +
sum(rate(cs_dockersource_hits_total{instance="$instance"}[$__interval]) or vector(0))

title: Crowdsec
description: Shows the 'cscli metrics' and additional stats to Crowdsec in Grafana
